dct_title_s: L'ancien et le nouveau Méxique avec la Floride et la basse Louisiane : partie occidentale
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Prime meridian: Paris. "117." Historic Maps copy is western sheet of a 2 sheet map and does not include Florida or Louisiana. Probably issued in: Atlas encyclopédique / R. Bonne and N. Desmarest. A Paris : Hôtel de Thou, 1787-1788.
